title: 'Ink'
body: Horrible pens. The ink isn't dark enough to write properly. Very light ink in the pen.

title: 'Excellent pen'
body: The media could not be loaded. This is a single-use fountain pen – ideal for beginners to get their practice in or people who don't want to think about cartridges. It's just so lush to write with. The ink flows so smoothly – and yet takes almost no time to dry, it's also absorbed easily without a heavy bleed

title: 'Nice pens'
body: The pens are smooth and and the nib is thin just as I like.The pen is very light to hold and you don't get any grip on it but it feels good while writing. The only problem is that it can smudge sometimes. Otherwise the performance and quality are awesome...

title: 'Best pen'
body: 'Very good pen. Slim and slick pen. Good and long writing use. Best pen and good for students and Office use.'

title: 'Smooth writing'
body: 'Good one. Even flow of ink. Recommend for daily use for students. Not found at stationary outlets. From the Trusted brand.'
